quote: Inara has tremendously helped me in my personal growth. It is a comfort zone and a home away from home where I can express myself and give back.
name: Kiran Kirti Rath

quote: I learned a great deal from my colleagues and the projects we undertook together. The people are the most impressive aspect and I made many friends here.
name: Saddicha Bal

quote: Inara is a consoling place where everyone is free to speak, learn and progress. It helped me improve my character and socializing.
name: Samyak Chhotaray

quote: Inara has made me a better person, from the orphanage project to Project Amrit. I gained valuable experience and friends for life.
name: Soumya Suman

quote: Participating in various projects gave me the opportunity to help those in need and be a better person. The amazing people I met feel like family.
name: Sankalpa Swain

quote: Inara has inspired me to be a better person—meeting new people, helping those in need, and exchanging smiles are life’s greatest assets.
name: Roshni

quote: Being part of Inara keeps me connected to Odisha and fills me with pride. I’m grateful for the opportunity to be part of our impactful work.
name: Avishikta

quote: From meeting new people to animal shelters and monthly activities, this journey has been full of memories. Inara became a source of comfort during difficult times.
name: Debashree Darshana Giri

quote: I finally got to do what I always wanted—visiting orphanages and animal shelters. Inara gave me the perfect platform and new friends.
name: Anshul Amrit

quote: Inara helped me meet amazing individuals who motivated me to exceed my limits and has been instrumental in my growth every day.
name: Subham Sarthak Das
